授業目的: This is a continuation of the Speaking 1 and Speaking II classes. The goal for this class is to develop your reading and speaking skills.  Almost all of the activities in the class will be either reading or speaking activities. The topics in this class will be discussed more in depth to give the students a chance to develop their own ideas and opinions and to be able to express their ideas and opinions using an audio MP3 recording.

Course Goals
This course is designed to…

 build your confidence to use English
 increase your vocabulary and knowledge about various topics
 improve your reading and listening comprehension
